titleStmt.title: Act repealing all acts of Parliament or Committee made for the late unlawfull engagement, and ratifying the protestation and opposition against the same.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Convention of Estates.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Dated on p. 1: At Edinburgh the sixteen day of January the yeer of God one thousand six hundred fourty nine years.
Signed at end: William Scot, Cler. Parl.
Imperfect: blurred print with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
